Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 2017.12 - ALAS2-2020-1524: medium priority package update for geronimo-jaxrpc
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2018-12085:
	Liblouis 3.6.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the function parseChars in compileTranslationTable.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-11440.
1589940: CVE-2018-12085 liblouis: Stack-based buffer overflow in compileTranslationTable.c

CVE-2018-11685:
	Liblouis 3.5.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the function compileHyphenation in compileTranslationTable.c.
1588636: CVE-2018-11685 liblouis: Stack-based buffer overflow in function compileHyphenation in compileTranslationTable.c

CVE-2018-11684:
	Liblouis 3.5.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the function includeFile in compileTranslationTable.c.
1588631: CVE-2018-11684 liblouis: Stack-based buffer overflow in function includeFile in compileTranslationTable.c

CVE-2018-11577:
	Liblouis 3.5.0 has a Segmentation fault in lou_logPrint in logging.c.
1585905: CVE-2018-11577 liblouis: Segmentation fault in logging.c:lou_logPrint()
